meanings.definition: Twitchers: People who observe and identify birds as a hobby.
meanings.sent1: The twitchers gathered in the park to spot rare birds.
meanings.sent2: Many twitchers carry binoculars to see birds up close.
meanings.sent3: The twitchers chuckled as they tried to identify a tiny bird.
meanings.sent4: The twitchers' excitement soared when they spotted a colorful parrot.
meanings.sent5: The twitchers' passion for birdwatching was contagious.

meanings.definition: Twitchers: A person who twitches or jerks involuntarily.
meanings.sent1: The young boy was known as the twitchers in the class.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes twitchers may have sudden movements they can't control.
meanings.sent3: The twitchers accidentally knocked over a stack of books.
meanings.sent4: Her twitchers were like a dance to an unknown rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The twitchers' movements were unpredictable and erratic.

meanings.definition: Twitchers: A group of people who twitch or jerk involuntarily.
meanings.sent1: The twitchers in the room all shared similar symptoms.
meanings.sent2: The support group welcomed new twitchers with open arms.
meanings.sent3: The twitchers at the party laughed at their synchronized movements.
meanings.sent4: The twitchers' unity in movement was oddly mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The twitchers formed a unique bond through their shared experiences.
